mapper.select: select da.id,da.datatime,da.datavalue,t.id as datatypeid,t.datatype,t.unit,db.id as pk_deviceid, db.device_id,db.devicetype_id,db.model,db.comments as devicecomments,db.longitude,db.latitude,db.area_id, db.firstuptime,db.updatetime,db.state as devicestate,db.datastatus as devicedatestatus from data da join datatypes t on da.datatype_id = t.id join devices db on da.device_id = db.id where da.datatype_id = ${dataTypeid} and db.area_id in (${areaIds}) order by datatime desc

select da.id,da.datatime,da.datavalue,t.id as datatypeid,t.datatype,t.unit,db.id as pk_deviceid, db.device_id,db.devicetype_id,db.model,db.comments as devicecomments,db.longitude,db.latitude,db.area_id, db.firstuptime,db.updatetime,db.state as devicestate,db.datastatus as devicedatestatus from data da join datatypes t on da.datatype_id = t.id join devices db on da.device_id = db.id where da.datatype_id = ${dataTypeid} and db.area_id in (${areaIds}) and da.datatime > ${startTime} and da.datatime < ${endTime} order by datatime desc

select da.id,da.datatime,da.datavalue,t.id as datatypeid,t.datatype,t.unit,db.id as pk_deviceid, db.device_id,db.devicetype_id,db.model,db.comments as devicecomments,db.longitude,db.latitude,db.area_id, db.firstuptime,db.updatetime,db.state as devicestate,db.datastatus as devicedatestatus from data da join datatypes t on da.datatype_id = t.id join devices db on da.device_id = db.id where db.area_id in (${_parameter})
